head: Margin
description:
Most players don’t understand the concept of a sportsbook margin. However, the bookmaker's margin has to do with the measure of profit it gets or has over its players. In other words, if the margin is very high, then you are likely to make any profit playing on their website. A bookmaker with a margin of less than 110% will offer competitive odds.

Average Margin

When a bookmaker's margin is less than 110%, then it shows that they are not making so much profit from their players. We calculated the 1xBet margin for Odds Overround for 2 matches in the Premier League.

The total Odds Overound were discovered to be 103.26 and 101.83. These odds are quite impressive and 1xBet has some of the best odds compared to other sports betting sites. Besides, 1xBet also provides high and low odds you can choose to play safe with the lower odds.
